text: Vendaval (Gale in English) is a song of the former Banda Calypso. It was the first single. == The song == Did not have national impact, but had a good impact in Belém and in cities of the Northeast. The music was present in top 3 compilations of the band, Os 20 Super Sucessos, Os Maiores Sucessos and As 20+. Also achieved considerable success in 2001, when it was re-recorded by the band sergipana Calcinha Preta being present in your CD volume 7, Seu Coração vai A´render o que é Paixão == Today == According to Joelma and Chimbinha, the fans ask many old songs for new shows, songs like Vendaval and others of the same age. On tour Sweden the band did not take the repertoire of music and made a simple presentation without choreography or effects, simply Joelma and the public. Category:1999 singles Category:1999 songs
title: Vendaval (song)
